metadata.title: CVE-2022-48826 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/vc4: Fix deadlock on DSI device attach errorDSI device attach to DSI host will be done with host device's
